channel.title: String error
channel.description:
Ok i recently added alot of commands, just some fun emote commands and an ::alch command for players on my server. All of a sudden random commands are working. My command for yell is ::yell, but some people can only do it using ::messa or some only ::. I have no clue why this is happening. And commands that worked perfectly now dc my users. The simple alch command dcs them. Help please.
[code]
Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Oelecthor. java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:7029) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13901) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15618) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] note: I never touched anything to do with packet size. get that every time they do something with ::

item.title: String error
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You can delete your post you know… and the topic will go back to the position it was at before you posted.

item.title: String error
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

this is not happening when compiled, my code gets 0 errors when compiled and to my knowledge the code is fine. It worked last night, then gradually got worse. Now pretty much no commands work. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2009, 09:23:06 pm[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic

item.title: String error

item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

Ok i recently added alot of commands, just some fun emote commands and an ::alch command for players on my server. All of a sudden random commands are working. My command for yell is ::yell, but some people can only do it using ::messa or some only ::. I have no clue why this is happening. And commands that worked perfectly now dc my users. The simple alch command dcs them. Help please.
